attributes.action: Allow a referendum on implementation of the EU Constition treaty and Charter of rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of todays report of Prime Minister Blairs agreement to a treaty on an EU Constitution and Charter of rights, we, the British People, despite the deal done, should now be given the right to vote in a referendum, which the majority of citizens would think we were promised, as to whether we agree that Britain should be party to such Constitutions or Charters.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/eumembership/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
